summary: While filming an advertisement, some extreme sports enthusiasts unwittingly stop a group of terrorists.
cast: Devon Sawa|Bridgette Wilson-Sampras|Rupert Graves|Rufus Sewell|Heino Ferch|Joe Absolom|Jana Pallaske|Jean-Pierre Castaldi|Liliana Komorowska|Klaus Löwitsch|David Scheller|Detlef Bothe|Heinrich Schmieder|Franjo Marincic|Rade Radovic|Lex Kreps|Wolfgang Packhäuser|Norbert Blecha|Vicky Huang|Hiro Kanagawa|Troy Yorke|Patrick Godin|Dominic Ropars|Kevin Simard|Sascha Manuel Hodak|Ivan Vukov
title: Riesgo extremo
